name: UFS_S_BAT_UNCORE_FREQ_PER_PKG_CHANGE
summary: Verify Intel UFS pkg initial min and max value should be non-zero, set test min/max freq to the initial min/max +/-200MHz,then change min/max freq by package, verify all the uncore min/max_freq_khz knobs under related pkg should be set to the same value as pkg.
